holidays.title: National Chocolate Cake Day
holidays.description: Layered, molten, Bundt, fluffy, mousse-y, decadent, frosted, it is love at first bite!

holidays.title: Auschwitz Liberation Day
holidays.description: We ought to never forget such hate and violence — so let’s observe in unison!

holidays.title: Holocaust Memorial Day
holidays.description: Today, we remember the courage and strength of those who suffered and died during the Holocaust.

holidays.title: National Geographic Day
holidays.description: Come and celebrate with us because there is ‘NAThing’ like “National Geographic,” are we right?

holidays.title: National Plan for Vacation Day
holidays.description: Get ready to plan for a new adventure this National Plan for Vacation Day!

holidays.title: Punch the Clock Day
holidays.description: Trust us — celebrating Punch the Clock Day is not a waste of time!

holidays.title: Speak Up and Succeed Day
holidays.description: Take a deep breath and raise your voice this Speak Up and Succeed Day.

holidays.title: Thomas Crapper Day
holidays.description: Don’t let all his work go down the crapper, come celebrate Thomas Crapper Day with us!

holidays.title: Vietnam Peace Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore some important history this Vietnam Peace Day.

holidays.title: World Breast Pumping Day
holidays.description: Let's all encourage moms to provide healthy nutrition for the little tots the easy way.

holidays.title: Benny Soliven’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube-famous celebrity knows how to make people smile and forget their troubles!

holidays.title: Carl Radke’s Birthday
holidays.description: From his humble beginnings to his time in the spotlight, learn more about Carl Radke here.

holidays.title: FaZe Sway’s Birthday
holidays.description: No one plays “Fortnite: better than the exceptionally talented gamer, FaZe Sway.

holidays.title: Kathleen Lights’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kathleen Fuentes is a gifted makeup artist who uploads useful makeup videos on YouTube.

holidays.title: Vincent Herbert’s Birthday
holidays.description: This record producer has carved a niche for himself in the entertainment scene.

holidays.title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart’s Birthday
holidays.description: The prolific and impossibly talented composer will remain influential until the end of time.
